nodes.text: Lialic was an astronomical object located in the regions known as the Deep Core and the Interior. It was also situated in the grid square K-12 of the Standard Galactic Grid.

Lialic was introduced in the current Star Wars canon in the thirty-sixth issue of Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon magazine, published around September 9, 2015. The Lialic system was originally introduced in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry.
